translation.en: [creatures] True!
-♪ She's True ♪ -True!
-♪ True ♪ -True!
♪ She'll wish for me and you ♪
♪ Hero, hero ♪
♪ She's True ♪
♪ True and the Rainbow Kingdom ♪
Is that Wuzzle Wegg for me, True? It is, isn't it? It is.
translation.ko: 그거 나 줄 워즐 달걀이니? 내 말 맞지? 아니야?

translation.en: Oh! You know my favorite color is blue, right?
translation.ko: 내 말 맞지? 아니야? 내가 파란색 좋아하는 거 알지? 아니, 노란색이야!

translation.en: No, wait, it's yellow!
translation.ko: 내가 파란색 좋아하는 거 알지? 아니, 노란색이야!

translation.en: No peeking, Bartleby!
You can't see your Wuzzle Wegg until it's finished.
Wuzzle Wegg Day rules.
Don't you have a Wegg to decorate?
Of course I do. I just, um... you know, haven't started yet.
translation.ko: 당연히 꾸밀 거지만 아직 시작을 안 했을 뿐이야

translation.en: Galloping green, Bartleby!
It can take time to get a Wuzzle Wegg decorated just so!
translation.ko: 워즐 달걀을 그 색으로 꾸미려면 시간이 필요한 법이지

translation.en: Why do we give painted Weggs on Wuzzle Wegg Day anyway?
translation.ko: 왜 워즐 달걀의 날에는 워즐 달걀을 색칠하나요?

translation.en: You mean you've never heard the story of the Wuzzlebun?
translation.ko: 지금까지 워즐 토끼 얘기를 들어본 적 없니?

translation.en: A Wuzzlebun? Sounds cuddly. Like wuzzy-wuzzy-woo!
translation.ko: 워즐 토끼요? 와락 껴안고 싶네요 복슬복슬할 테니까요

translation.en: Oh, yes, they were cuddly.
And magical.
You see, a long time ago, Wuzzlebuns roamed free
translation.ko: 옛날 옛날에 워즐 토끼들은 알록달록 초원을 마음껏 돌아다녔지

translation.en: in the Many Colors Meadow.
translation.ko: 워즐 토끼들은 알록달록 초원을 마음껏 돌아다녔지

translation.en: A Wuzzlebun used its magic to turn ordinary Weggs
translation.ko: 그중 한 마리가 마법을 써서 평범한 워즐 달걀을 마술 워즐 달걀로 바꿨단다

translation.en: into Magical Wuzzle Weggs, filled with special treats.
translation.ko: 평범한 워즐 달걀을 마술 워즐 달걀로 바꿨단다 속에 특별한 사탕이 가득했지

translation.en: What kind of treats?
All kinds of wonderful things the Rainbow Kingdom never had before.
translation.ko: 무지개 왕국에서 보지 못한 여러 가지 맛있는 사탕이었어

translation.en: Grabbleapples, mushmallows.
-And were there Fishy Poofs? -Fishy Poofs?
translation.ko: 생선 맛은요? 생선 맛도 있었단다, 바틀비 바로 그때 그 맛이 탄생했지

translation.en: Yes. I'm sure that's where Fishy Poofs came from, Bartleby.
translation.ko: 생선 맛도 있었단다, 바틀비 바로 그때 그 맛이 탄생했지

translation.en: But where did all the Wuzzlebuns go?
translation.ko: 근데 워즐 토끼들은 다 어디 갔죠?

translation.en: No one has seen a Wuzzlebun in one million, three thousand and seventy-two years.
translation.ko: 1,003,072년 동안 아무도 워즐 토끼를 보지 못했단다

translation.en: But we still decorate pretend Wuzzle Weggs
translation.ko: 하지만 우리는 워즐 달걀의 날을 맞을 때마다

translation.en: and give them to our friends on Wuzzle Wegg Day
to celebrate the magic of the Wuzzlebuns.
This year I'm going to give you the prettiest, most awesome Wuzzle Wegg
translation.ko: 이번에 난 네게 최고로 예쁘고 멋진 워즐 달걀을

translation.en: you've ever seen, True.
But first, um, I have to find it.
Good luck, B!
Ah, the Many Colors Meadow. Smells like spring.
translation.ko: 아, 알록달록 초원에서 향기로운 봄 내음이 느껴져

translation.en: Now to find myself the prettiest, most awesome Wuzzle Wegg ever!
translation.ko: 이제부터 최고로 예쁘고 멋진 워즐 달걀을 찾아야지

translation.en: Uh, that, huh?
Oh, okay, thanks.
Okay, okay, just point. I can follow pointing, you know.
translation.ko: 그냥 방향만 알려주면 내가 알아서 갈 수 있거든?

translation.en: No one saw that, right?
Whoa!
Oh, my paws!
Those pushy plants were right. It's a Wegg!
translation.ko: 꽃들이 날 괜히 밀친 게 아니었어 달걀이다!

translation.en: Not just any old Wegg.
The biggest Wegg ever!
True's eyes are gonna pop out of her head when she sees this!
translation.ko: 트루가 이걸 보면 깜짝 놀라서 눈이 튀어나오겠어

translation.en: I'm back!
And I found you the best Wegg in the universe.
translation.ko: 네게 줄 우주 최고의 달걀을 찾았지

translation.en: You gotta see it to believe it. True, it's amazing!
translation.ko: 직접 봐야 해 트루, 얼마나 놀라운지 몰라!

translation.en: But don't look. You can't see it until it's done.
translation.ko: 하지만 보면 안 돼 달걀이 완성될 때까지 기다려

translation.en: Wuzzle Wegg Day rules!
I need paint! Lots of paint.
- And a brush! - [True and Rainbow King laugh]
Aren't you just the best widdle Weggy?
translation.ko: 네가 이 세상 최고의 꼬마 달걀이니?

translation.en: Aw, widdle Weggy's so cute. Bartleby loves Weggy!
translation.ko: 너무 귀여운 꼬마 달걀 바틀비는 달걀을 사랑해

translation.en: Bartleby can't wait to give widdle Weggy to best friend True.
translation.ko: 바틀비는 꼬마 달걀을 얼른 절친 트루한테 주고 싶어

translation.en: Whoops! Need more paint.
Stay right here, Weggy.
Be good for Bartleby. I'll be right back.
translation.ko: 내 말 잘 들을 거지? 금방 올게

translation.en: [Weggy] Oh, Ba-ba-bee!
Ba-ba-bee! Whoa!
Ba-ba-bee!
Ba-ba-bee!
Weggy?
Weggy? Weggy! Where are you, Weggy?!
True, Rainbow King, come quick!
-What's wrong? -Out of paint already?
No! I... was working on an amazing Wuzzle Wegg for True,
translation.ko: 아뇨! 트루한테 줄 멋진 워즐 달걀을 꾸미다가

translation.en: and then I just left for a second and when I got back it was gone!
translation.ko: 잠깐 어디 갔다 왔더니 달걀이 사라졌어요!

translation.en: Someone or something took it.
Look at those footprints! They're ginormous!
They're pretty big, all right.
These tracks should be easy to follow.
We'll have the Mystery of the Missing Wegg solved in no time.
[chuckles] I love a good mystery!
Time to track that Wegg-snatcher!
We're coming, Weggy!
[True] What a weird path.
It's like it doesn't know where it's going.
Right!
It's almost as if it's looking for more Weggs to steal.
translation.ko: 달걀을 더 훔칠 생각이었던 거 같아

translation.en: It all fits. Wegg-snatcher gotta snatch Weggs.
This is no ordinary thief.
It's definitely some kind of extra-strong, super-sneaky,
translation.ko: 엄청나게 강하고, 교활하고 거대하고, 북슬북슬한 데다

translation.en: humongously hairy, big-fanged, Wegg-stealing monster,
translation.ko: 엄청나게 강하고, 교활하고 거대하고, 북슬북슬한 데다 송곳니도 난 달걀 도둑이 향한 곳은 분명히...

translation.en: headed right for...
translation.ko: 송곳니도 난 달걀 도둑이 향한 곳은 분명히...

translation.en: ...Rainbow City!
Uh-oh.
Just look at everyone innocently walking around with their Wuzzle Weggs.
translation.ko: 하나같이 천진난만한 얼굴로 워즐 달걀을 들고 다니는군

translation.en: Right out in the open,
where the Wuzzle Wegg thief could see them.
We have to tell everyone to hide their Weggs,
until this extra-strong, super-sneaky, humongously hairy,
translation.ko: 엄청나게 강하고, 교활하고 거대하고, 북슬북슬한 데다

translation.en: big-fanged, Wegg-stealing monster... [gasps]
...is caught!
I'm not sure this is a full-scale emergency just yet, Bartleby.
translation.ko: 아직 매우 급한 비상사태인지 잘 모르겠구나, 바틀비

translation.en: Uh, True, what do you think?
Hmm, the footprints are really big,
and B's Wegg did go missing.
I guess Bartleby could be right about a Wegg-snatching monster.
translation.ko: 달걀 도둑이 있다는 바틀비 말이 맞을지도 몰라요

translation.en: Oh, I'd hate to spoil Wuzzle Wegg Day.
translation.ko: 워즐 달걀의 날을 망치기가 너무나도 싫구나

translation.en: But if Bartleby is right,
we have to keep everyone and their Wuzzle Weggs safe.
translation.ko: 우리가 시민들과 달걀의 안전을 지켜야 해

translation.en: All right then, it is decided.
Attention, all Rainbow Kingdom citizens.
We have evidence of an unknown Wegg-stealing monster in the kingdom.
translation.ko: 왕국에 정체 모를 달걀 도둑이 있다는 증거를 찾았습니다

translation.en: Please proceed to hide your Weggs in a safe place
translation.ko: 어서 여러분의 달걀을 안전한 장소에 숨기고

translation.en: and gather in the square until further notice.
translation.ko: 다음 소식을 전할 때까지 광장에 모여 기다리세요

translation.en: A Wegg-stealing monster? You heard the King, hide all the Weggs!
translation.ko: 달걀 도둑이라고? 폐하 말씀 들었어? 달걀을 전부 숨겨!

translation.en: [grumbling] There we go.
If this monster is as horrible as Bartleby suspects,
we may have to cancel Wuzzle Wegg Day altogether.
translation.ko: 워즐 달걀의 날을 아예 취소해야 할지도 몰라

translation.en: [both] Cancel Wuzzle Wegg Day?!
But, Rainbow King, please, you can't cancel it.
translation.ko: 무지개 임금님, 제발요 취소는 안 돼요

translation.en: We're going to find out what happened to Bartleby's Wegg
and we're going to have Wuzzle Wegg Day.
translation.ko: 워즐 달걀의 날을 즐길 수 있을 거예요

translation.en: I knew I could count on you.
Good luck, True. Good luck, Bartleby.
Okay, Bartleby, we have no more tracks to follow.
translation.ko: 좋아, 바틀비 뒤쫓을 발자국이 더는 없어

translation.en: Monster tracks.
Don't forget that they're Wegg-snatching monster tracks.
translation.ko: 달걀을 훔치는 괴물 발자국이라는 걸 명심해

translation.en: [True] They may be monster tracks.
Without maybe-monster tracks to follow,
the only way we can solve this mystery in time to save Wuzzle Wegg Day
translation.ko: 수수께끼를 풀어서 워즐 달걀의 날을 지킬 유일한 방법은

translation.en: is with Wish help.
Oh, Cumulo!
To the Wishing Tree, please!
[Zee] How do you feel about purple?
Hi, Zee! Hi, Wishes! Happy Wuzzle Wegg Day.
translation.ko: 안녕, 지 소원들도 안녕 즐거운 워즐 달걀의 날이야

translation.en: True, Bartleby, I'm so glad you came.
Some of the Wishes wanted to be painted like Wuzzle Weggs.
[giggles] You all look fantastic.
But Wuzzle Wegg Day is why we're here.
translation.ko: 우린 워즐 달걀의 날 때문에 왔어

translation.en: Bartleby had a special Wuzzle Wegg.
The best Wegg ever!
And we think it may have been taken.
translation.ko: 근데 그걸 누가 가져간 거 같아

translation.en: By a super strong, giant Wegg-snatching monster
translation.ko: 엄청 강하고, 거대하고 발톱과 송곳니도 난 달걀 도둑이

translation.en: with fangs and claws who just stole my perfect Wegg
translation.ko: 엄청 강하고, 거대하고 발톱과 송곳니도 난 달걀 도둑이 내 완벽한 달걀을 훔쳐서 어딘가에 다시 갖다 놨어!

translation.en: and took it back to its mystery lair,
translation.ko: 내 완벽한 달걀을 훔쳐서 어딘가에 다시 갖다 놨어!

translation.en: and we tried to follow it, but the monster tracks disappeared!
-We don't know that's what happened. -Oh, I know... here.
translation.ko: 아직 확실하게는 몰라 난 알아, 마음으로 느끼지

translation.en: It is true that we saw big footprints.
translation.ko: 확실한 건 우리가 본 커다란 발자국이

translation.en: And then they stopped.
And we have to solve the mystery or the Rainbow King might have to...
translation.ko: 우리가 수수께끼를 풀어야 해 아니면 임금님이 어쩔 수 없이...

translation.en: cancel Wuzzle Wegg Day.
Hmm. Let's sit...
and have a think.
Okay, True, how can the Wishing Tree help you?
translation.ko: 좋아, 트루 소원 나무가 어떻게 도우면 될까?

translation.en: -I think-- -If I may.
First, we need to find the snatcher. Then we need to steal back the Wegg.
translation.ko: 우선, 우리가 도둑을 찾은 다음 내 달걀을 다시 훔치고

translation.en: Then we need to get away real fast.
And we need to make it so that they can't steal the Wegg ever again!
translation.ko: 도둑이 다신 달걀을 훔칠 수 없게 반드시 성공해야 하지

translation.en: Uh, I think what Bartleby is trying to say is that we need to find the Wegg...
translation.ko: 바틀비 얘기를 정리하자면 달걀을 찾아야 한다는 거야

translation.en: And the monster.
And bring the Wegg home so we can save Wuzzle Wegg Day.
translation.ko: - 그 괴물도 - 달걀을 찾아와야지 워즐 달걀의 날을 지켜야 해

translation.en: The Wishing Tree has heard you, True.
It is time to get your three Wishes.
translation.ko: 이제 세 가지 소원을 고를 차례야

translation.en: I'm ready!
Wishing Tree, Wishing Tree,
please share your wonderful Wishes with me.
[True] ♪ Wishing Tree ♪
♪ Share with me ♪
-♪ Tiny wishes, one, two, three ♪ -Scanzee!
translation.ko: - 작은 소원, 하나, 둘, 셋 - 스캔지!

translation.en: -♪ Wishing Tree, please share with me ♪ -Samesame!
-♪ Magic power for you and me ♪ -Hey, ho, Grapplo! Hah!
♪ Magic power ♪ ♪ In the Wishing Tree ♪
I sure hope those Wishes have extra oomph 'cause we're gonna need it. [meows]
translation.ko: 특별한 힘을 지닌 소원들이겠지? 우리한텐 그게 필요하거든

translation.en: Let's check them out in the Wishopedia.
The first Wish is Scanzee, a locator Wish.
translation.ko: 첫 번째 소원은 스캔지야 위치를 찾는 소원이지

translation.en: -It's my star Wish at Hide-and-Go-Seek. -[chiming]
Scanzee sounds like the perfect Wish for finding Bartleby's Wegg.
And the monster.
Now, your next Wish is... Samesame, one of the best mimic Wishes.
translation.ko: 자, 다음 소원은 새임새임이야 흉내를 잘 내는 소원이지

translation.en: This Wish can copy the sound or voice of anything it meets.
translation.ko: 어떤 소리나 음성도 똑같이 따라 할 수 있어

translation.en: -Samesame! -Really? Like what?
-Really? Like what? -Whoa-whoa!
Whoa-whoa!
-Okay, cut it out. -Okay, cut it out.
-No, really. -No, really.
-How do you turn this Wish off? -How do you turn this Wish off?
translation.ko: - 진심이야 - 이 소원 좀 멈춰줘! 이 소원 좀 멈춰줘!

translation.en: [laughs] Okay, Samesame, all done.
Samesame sounds just like Bartleby.
Perfect distraction.
We can use Samesame to distract the snatcher
while we steal back Weggy from right under its monster nose.
translation.ko: 괴물 코밑에 있을 내 달걀을 다시 훔치는 거야

translation.en: If it has a nose.
What about our third Wish, Zee?
Grapplo, a pickup Wish. It can pick up and carry anything.
translation.ko: 그라플로, 드는 소원이야 뭐든 번쩍 들어서 옮길 수 있지

translation.en: Grapplo! Ho!
Yes! The perfect Wegg-snatching device!
Or... oh, oh, oh!
We should just, bam, snatch the monster and all its Wegg-snatching friends,
translation.ko: 우리 그냥 갑자기 들이닥칠까? 괴물과 달걀을 훔치는 친구들을 공격하는 거야

translation.en: yeah-yeah, and move them far, far away from Rainbow Kingdom
translation.ko: 그런 다음에 녀석들을 무지개 왕국에서 먼 곳으로 보내고

translation.en: and save Wuzzle Wegg Day!
Don't worry, B, I'm sure these Wishes are just what we need.
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 비 세 가지 소원이면 충분할 거야

translation.en: Zoo-zip-zap, Wishes in my pack.
Time to find the missing Wegg.
And steal it back.
Oh, oh! Thanks, Zee!
Aren't you gonna use Scanzee?
I mean, we've gotta find that monster before it takes my Weggy too far away.
translation.ko: 내 달걀이 너무 멀리 가기 전에 그 괴물을 찾아야 해

translation.en: Let's ask around first.
If there was a strange anything wandering around town with the Wegg,
translation.ko: 낯선 존재가 근처에서 달걀을 들고 서성였다면

translation.en: I'm sure somebody noticed.
Great idea, True. Let's crack this case wide open!
translation.ko: 좋은 생각이야, 트루 사건의 실체를 확실히 밝혀보자

translation.en: Nobody's seen your special Wegg.
translation.ko: 아무도 네 특별한 달걀을 못 봤대

translation.en: Or the monster that snatched it.
Now can we use Scanzee? Pretty please with a Fishy Poof on top?
translation.ko: 이제 스캔지를 쓰면 안 돼? 내가 귀엽고 간절하게 부탁할게

translation.en: Absolutely.
Time for my first Wish.
Zip-zap-zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Scanzee! Wish come true!
Scanzee, we're looking for a very special Wegg that looks like this.
translation.ko: 스캔지, 우린 아주 특별한 달걀을 찾고 있어 바로 이렇게 생겼지

translation.en: And a very scary monster that looks like this!
translation.ko: 이렇게 생긴 무시무시한 괴물도 찾아야 해

translation.en: [Bartleby] Scanzee!
I think Scanzee's found something.
And it's going to the Many Colors Meadow.
-[Scanzee] Scanzee! -[both gasp]
It's Weggy!
And the monster's got him and he's getting away!
translation.ko: - 달걀이야 - 괴물한테 잡혀 있어! 도망치려고 해!

translation.en: Weggy, we're coming to rescue you!
Scanzee!
Oh! Th-th-the monster's inside my Wegg!
translation.ko: 트루! 괴물이 내 달걀 속에 들어갔어!

translation.en: There really was a Wegg-snatching monster.
Hey! Hey, you!
Leave my Wegg alone, you terrible Wegg-snatching thing, you!
translation.ko: 내 달걀에서 냉큼 나와 끔찍한 달걀 도둑!

translation.en: [Weggy] Ba-ba-bee?
-[gasps] -Uh-oh!
Ba-ba-bee!
-[screams] It's chasing us! -[True] Run!
[Weggy] Ba-ba-bee!
Quick, Scanzee, back in the pack!
I'm sorry I didn't believe you, B.
translation.ko: 네 말을 안 믿었던 거 사과할게

translation.en: I hate being so right all the time!
translation.ko: 이럴 때는 내가 좀 틀렸으면 좋겠어!

translation.en: [gasps] I changed my mind! You can have the Wegg, take it!
translation.ko: 마음이 바뀌었어! 난 됐으니까 그 달걀을 가져!

translation.en: It's still chasing us,
but it can't see anything from inside the Wegg.
translation.ko: 달걀 안에서는 아무것도 안 보일 텐데

translation.en: It must be following your voice.
[whispering] Shh! It's following your voice.
I can't help it. I just have one of those deep, irresistible voices...
translation.ko: 나도 어쩔 수 없어! 깊고 매력적인 목소리를 타고났는걸!

translation.en: -[echoing] Voices! -[Weggy] Ba-ba-bee?
I know how to get it to stop chasing us.
translation.ko: 우리를 못 쫓아오게 할 방법이 있어

translation.en: Time for my second Wish!
Zip-zap-zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Samesame.
Wish come true!
Samesame, I need you to copy Bartleby's voice
so that monster can hear it.
-[Weggy] Ba-ba-bee? -No time! It's coming this way!
[Samesame] This way! This way! This way!
[Weggy] Ba-ba-bee!
[Scanzee] This way! This way!
Phew! It worked.
Oh, no! We just sent Samesame towards Rainbow City.
translation.ko: 안 돼! 우리가 새임새임을 무지개 도시 쪽으로 보냈어

translation.en: [Samesame] This way! This way!
We have to get there first and warn everyone about the monster!
translation.ko: 우리가 먼저 도착해서 괴물을 조심하라고 경고해야 해!

translation.en: -Come on! -Again with the running?
Well, this is just about the most boring Wuzzle Wegg Day ever.
translation.ko: 이렇게 재미없는 워즐 달걀의 날은 난생처음이야!

translation.en: [Bartleby's voice] This way! This way!
Bartleby?
Weggy, stop!
[Samesame] Weggy, stop!
[Weggy] Wha...? Ba-ba-bee?
Nobody move!
There's an extra-strong, super-sneaky, hairy,
translation.ko: 엄청나게 강하고, 교활하고 거대하고, 북슬북슬한 데다

translation.en: big-fanged, egg-stealing snatcher... [gasps]
translation.ko: 엄청나게 강하고, 교활하고 거대하고, 북슬북슬한 데다 송곳니도 난 달걀 도둑이...

translation.en: ...inside that Wegg!
That was probably the wrong thing to say.
-[Weggy] Ba-ba-bee? -[yelling]
[Weggy] Ba-ba-bee!
We have to fix this. And stop that monster!
translation.ko: 우리가 문제를 해결해야 해 저 괴물도 막아야 하고

translation.en: Ahh, nopeitty nope. No can do. I'm not going anywhere near that thing.
translation.ko: 아니, 그건 아무도 못 해 난 괴물 근처에도 안 갈 거야

translation.en: Hmm. Maybe you don't have to.
Time for my third Wish.
Zip-zap-zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Grapplo!
[Grapplo] Grapplo!
Wish come true.
Can you grab that thing and keep it away from everyone?
translation.ko: 괴물을 번쩍 들어서 멀리 옮길 수 있니?

translation.en: Especially me? Keep it away from...
-[Weggy] Ba-ba-bee? -...me!
-Ba-ba-bee! -[shrieks]
Thanks, Grapplo. Don't let it go until we know what to do with it.
translation.ko: 고마워, 그라플로 우리가 방법을 찾을 때까지 놓치면 안 돼

translation.en: [gasps] Where's that beast?
I'll take care of it. I'm kitty-natti tough!
translation.ko: 괴물은 어디 있어? 내가 처리해주지 난 터프한 키티내티야

translation.en: -I'm... -It's okay, B, Grapplo's got it.
Oh, phew! Excellent job, Grapplo.
Make sure you hold that monster nice and tight.
You're the Wegg-snatcher? But you're so cute! And cuddly!
translation.ko: 네가 달걀 도둑이니? 너무 귀엽고 복슬복슬하잖아!

translation.en: Bartleby, this is no Wegg-snatcher.
It would seem you have found us a Wuzzlebun!
translation.ko: 네 덕분에 우리가 워즐 토끼를 찾은 거 같구나!

translation.en: A real live Wuzzlebun?
Like from the Wuzzle Wegg Day story?
Indeed!
Ba-ba-bee! I feel kind of silly now.
I told everyone there was an extra-strong, super-sneaky,
translation.ko: 엄청나게 강하고, 교활하고 거대하고, 북슬북슬한 데다

translation.en: big-fanged, egg-stealing monster.
-[both giggle] -B, it's okay. We all make mistakes.
Your imagination told you something was true when it wasn't.
translation.ko: 네 상상력이 진짜가 아닌 걸 진짜라고 한 거야

translation.en: But I didn't even get you a Wuzzle Wegg like I promised, True.
translation.ko: 하지만 너한테 약속한 워즐 달걀도 준비하지 못했어

translation.en: Bartleby, the Wuzzle Wegg you got for me had a Wuzzlebun inside it.
translation.ko: 바틀비, 네가 나한테 주려던 워즐 달걀에 워즐 토끼가 있었어!

translation.en: So I didn't ruin Wuzzle Wegg Day?
translation.ko: 내가 워즐 달걀의 날을 망친 게 아니야?

translation.en: Quite the opposite. You made this the most special one ever.
translation.ko: 정반대란다, 네 덕에 오늘이 굉장히 특별해졌어

translation.en: Woo-ho! I didn't ruin Wuzzle Wegg Day!
translation.ko: 내가 워즐 달걀의 날을 망치지 않았다!

translation.en: -Aw, Weggy! -Ba-ba-bee.
What just happened?
Wuzzlebun magic.
I suggest you all check inside your Wuzzle Weggs.
translation.ko: 모두 자신의 워즐 달걀 안을 확인해봐요

translation.en: Sparkles!
-You did that? -[Wuzzlebun giggles]
Whoa! I wish you could come every Wuzzle Wegg Day.
translation.ko: 워즐 달걀의 날마다 네가 오면 좋겠다

translation.en: Jumping jellygreen, Bartleby!
[laughs] What a wonderful idea!
From this moment on, we will celebrate Wuzzle Wegg Day
translation.ko: 지금 이 순간부터 매년 돌아오는 워즐 달걀의 날을

translation.en: with a visit from our new friend, the Wuzzlebun.
translation.ko: 우리의 새 친구 워즐 토끼와 함께하겠어요

translation.en: And hide our Weggs because it was so much fun.
translation.ko: 재밌어서 배꼽이 빠질지도 모르니 달걀은 숨겨둬요

translation.en: Great job, Wishes. Now, back in the pack.
We did it, B. We solved the mystery and found your Wegg and the... "Monster."
translation.ko: 우리가 해냈어, 수수께끼를 풀고 네 달걀도 찾았지, 그리고 괴물도

translation.en: All in time to save Wuzzle Wegg Day.
translation.ko: 워즐 달걀의 날을 늦지 않게 구했어

translation.en: Best day ever!
Even if you're the only one without a magic Wuzzle Wegg?
translation.ko: 너만 마술 워즐 달걀이 없는데 괜찮겠어?

translation.en: [gasps] Happy Wuzzle Wegg Day, Bartleby.
[Bartleby] You painted Fishy Poofs on it?
And me and you?
-It's perfect. Thanks, True. -Thanks, Weggy.
translation.ko: 정말 완벽해 - 고마워, 트루 - 고마워, 달걀아

translation.en: [gasps] Extra special mushmallow Fishy Poofs!
translation.ko: 세상에서 가장 특별한 생선 맛 버섯멜로야

translation.en: Thanks, Weggy! Happy Wuzzle Wegg Day!
translation.ko: 고마워, 달걀아 즐거운 워즐 달걀의 날이야!

translation.en: And see you next year!
Ba-ba-bee!
